properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth, ME to Merrimack River, MA out 25 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 4:06PM EST until January 12 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 6 to 9 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth, ME to Merrimack
River, MA out 25 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST SUNDAY
